name: Geometry.IO Flow - Battle Of Tricky Line
name_original: Geometry.IO Flow - Battle Of Tricky Line
description:
To conquer as much territory as possible.
It's initially very simple, and the game can be mastered immediately, but watch out: there's competition, and not everyone can win!

Whether you're bold or more careful, you have to be more cunning than your adversaries by finding the best strategy to conquer the most space. But be careful! You have a weak spot: your tail. If an enemy touches it, that's the end for you.
